PullRequest.Title: Added Write/WriteLine ReadOnlySpan/ReadOnlyMemory overrides to HttpResponseStreamWriter
PullRequest.Description:
Fixes #2895
Based on #18445. Will rebase and mark ready for review once that one is merged.

Issue.Title: Fix nulls in AnalyzerDependencyChecker
Issue.Description:
Currently we use a `Task.FromResult(null)` as a sentinel task before a real dependency check has been queued up. This works fine until we try to access the results of this task, and things blow up.
Instead, we should create an AnalyzerDependecyResults.Empty singleton, and create a task from that.
Also, this change catches all exceptions coming out of `AnalyzerDependencyChecker`, to avoid bringing down VS.
@heejaechang @srivatsn @mavasani @ManishJayaswal @jmarolf @shyamnamboodiripad Could you take a look, please?

Issue.Title: More work organizing code related to finding symbols.

PullRequest.Title: Remove Unsafe from ChunkWriter
PullRequest.Description:
Uses dotnet/runtime#1644 (not merged) to eliminate the bounds checks
Contributes to #4720
/cc @EgorBo @davidfowl

Issue.Title: make workspace event to be fired from background thread
Issue.Description:
currently, it fires events using synchronizationcontext where workspace is first created, in VS case, it is always UI thread.
we should just make the event to be fired from background thread (TaskScheulder.Default) and make each listener to have its own queue, so that events are fired concurrently for each listener but sequentially per listener.

Issue.Title: C# auto-formats property getter on new line instead of leaving it on a single line
Issue.Description:
**Steps to Reproduce** 1. Type the following:
``` csharp public Int32 PaymentMethodID { [System.Diagnostics.DebuggerStepThrough] get { return 10; } } ``` 1. Press Ctrl + K, D
**Expected** It remains the same. **Actual** There is a new line added after get and the open brace { which did not happen in VS 2013.
``` csharp public Int32 PaymentMethodID { [System.Diagnostics.DebuggerStepThrough] get { return 10; } } ```

PullRequest.Title: Cleanup in Identity tests
PullRequest.Description:
Fixes #10671 by using updated EF API Fixes #5812 so tests are re-enabled for PRs Also part of #10668 since one of the changed EF queries is now working
Finally, I removed all remaining platform skips since with SQLite these tests should now run anywhere.

Issue.Title: Add check for empty submission in C#/VB interactive evaluator
Issue.Description: With change in #9894, now it is possible to have an empty string (including whitespace characters) to be passed to evaluator for execution. We need to add a check to no-op empty submissions for C#/VB evaluator.

Issue.Title: Build failure on mac with Unable to load DLL 'System.Security.Cryptography.Native'
Issue.Description:
**Version Used**: 332810056e84bd520821a177f7bd7cb7520d1435
**Steps to Reproduce**: 1. On mac OSX El Capitan 10.11.4 2. git clone https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn.git 3. cd roslyn; make
**Expected Behavior**: successful build
**Actual Behavior**:
Restoring toolset packages log : Restoring packages for /Users/kashyap/Documents/dev/MS-CLR/roslyn/build/ToolsetPackages/project.json... error: Unable to load the service index for source https://www.myget.org/F/dotnet-coreclr/api/v3/index.json. error: The type initializer for 'Crypto' threw an exception. error: Unable to load DLL 'System.Security.Cryptography.Native': The specified module could not be found. error: (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E) Restore CrossPlatform.sln error: Unable to load the service index for source https://www.myget.org/F/dotnet-coreclr/api/v3/index.json. error: The type initializer for 'Crypto' threw an exception. error: Unable to load DLL 'System.Security.Cryptography.Native': The specified module could not be found. error: (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E) Restore failed make: **\* [/Users/kashyap/Documents/dev/MS-CLR/roslyn/Binaries/toolset/restore.semaphore] Error 255

PullRequest.Title: Add more timeouts to Http2TestBase
PullRequest.Description:
There are some Kestrel HTTP/2 tests that are hanging. The hangs should be fixed once we take a runtime that includes dotnet/corefx#34014. In the meantime, this PR makes the hanging tests fail after a 30 second timeout.
Addresses aspnet/AspNetCore-Internal#1529

Issue.Title: Nullable state is not updated for receiver if conditional access expression is a method call
Report code fix exceptions to the user.
Issue.Description: Updating the extension manager to report code-fix exceptions to the user. In Visual Studio this will cause an infobar to appear giving the user the option to either re-enable the crashing code-fix or re-enable it and ignore future crashes for that session of Visual Studio.
